Package com.intellij.openapi.vfs

Class VirtualFileManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.intellij.openapi.vfs.VirtualFileManager
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ModificationTracker
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    VirtualFileManagerEx

    public abstract class VirtualFileManager
extends java.lang.Object
implements ModificationTracker
    Manages virtual file systems.
    See Also:
    VirtualFileSystem

        See Also:

      • syncRefresh

        public abstract long syncRefresh()

        Refreshes the cached file systems information from the physical file systems synchronously.

        Note: this method should be only called within a write-action (see Application.runWriteAction(java.lang.Runnable))

        Returns:
        refresh session ID.

      • asyncRefresh

        public abstract long asyncRefresh(java.lang.Runnable postAction)
        Refreshes the cached file systems information from the physical file systems asynchronously. Launches specified action when refresh is finished.
        Returns:
        refresh session ID.

      • refreshWithoutFileWatcher

        public abstract void refreshWithoutFileWatcher(boolean asynchronous)

      • findFileByUrl

        public abstract VirtualFile findFileByUrl(java.lang.String url)
        Searches for a file specified by the given URL.
        Parameters:
        url - the URL to find file by
        Returns:
        VirtualFile if the file was found, null otherwise
        See Also:
        VirtualFile.getUrl(), VirtualFileSystem.findFileByPath(java.lang.String), refreshAndFindFileByUrl(java.lang.String)

      • refreshAndFindFileByUrl

        public abstract VirtualFile refreshAndFindFileByUrl(java.lang.String url)

        Refreshes only the part of the file system needed for searching the file by the given URL and finds file by the given URL.

        This method is useful when the file was created externally and you need to find VirtualFile corresponding to it.

        If this method is invoked not from Swing event dispatch thread, then it must not happen inside a read action.

        Parameters:
        url - the URL
        Returns:
        VirtualFile if the file was found, null otherwise
        See Also:
        VirtualFileSystem.findFileByPath(java.lang.String), VirtualFileSystem.refreshAndFindFileByPath(java.lang.String)

      • extractProtocol

        public static java.lang.String extractProtocol(java.lang.String url)
        Extracts protocol from the given URL. Protocol is a substring from the beginning of the URL till "://".
        Parameters:
        url - the URL
        Returns:
        protocol or null if there is no "://" in the URL
        See Also:
        VirtualFileSystem.getProtocol()

      • extractPath

        public static java.lang.String extractPath(java.lang.String url)
        Extracts path from the given URL. Path is a substring from "://" till the end of URL. If there is no "://" URL itself is returned.
        Parameters:
        url - the URL
        Returns:
        path

      • getModificationCount

        public abstract long getModificationCount()
        Specified by:
        getModificationCount in interface ModificationTracker
        Returns:
        a number that's incremented every time something changes in the VFS, i.e. file hierarchy, names, flags, attributes, contents. This only counts modifications done in current IDE session.
        See Also:
        getStructureModificationCount()

      • getStructureModificationCount

        public abstract long getStructureModificationCount()
        Returns:
        a number that's incremented every time something changes in the VFS structure, i.e. file hierarchy or names. This only counts modifications done in current IDE session.
        See Also:
        getModificationCount()
